byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: By buying Advent, SS&C will gain a big provider of software used by 4,300 investment fund managers, including hedge funds and family offices.

headline.main: SS&C to Buy Advent Software for $2.3 Billion
